description:
Feel like dipping into a fall weekend cross event? Or just do a little wet weather riding? Either way, these clip-on fenders have you covered. Clip-on design makes these fenders easy to pop on when you need them and off when you don’t.

  • Adjustable positioning lets you match the fit to your bike
  • No fender eyelets needed for installation
  • Easy to pop on and off
  • 33mm width helps catch extra spray
  • Works with most disc brakes
name: MEC Road Bike Clip-On Fenders
